  <plus-progress-bar

    variant="indeterminate"
    slot="top"
    style="height: 2px"
    hidden
  ></plus-progress-bar>
  <plus-faker></plus-faker>
</plus-accordion>

<plus-accordion summary="Summary" on:plus-expand={onPlusExpand} bind:this={accordionRef}>
  <plus-progress-bar variant="indeterminate" slot="top" style="height: 2px;" {hidden}
  ></plus-progress-bar>
  <plus-faker></plus-faker>
</plus-accordion>
